item.description: 非今天发布的且报名数量小于10的招募

sql-item.sql: select a.item_id,b.supplier_id,i.user_id,u.name,w.openid From ( select a.item_id,a.company_id,a.create_time from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item a INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on a.company_id=d.developer_id left join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register b on a.item_id=b.item_id where a.register_end_date>now() and DATE(now())<date('2016-10-02') and date(a.create_time) BETWEEN date(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 10*DATEDIFF(NOW(),date('2016-09-28')) DAY)) and date(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 10*(DATEDIFF(NOW(),date('2016-09-28'))-1)+1 DAY)) GROUP BY a.item_id having count(register_id)<10 ) a inner join ( SELECT supplier_id, item_id, Nom FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN @cn != b.supplier_id THEN @rownum:= 1 ELSE @rownum:= @rownum + 1 END AS Nom, @cn := b.supplier_id AS supplier_id, b.item_id FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) r, (SELECT @cn:='') p, b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_recruit b ORDER BY b.supplier_id, b.item_id DESC ) subQuery WHERE Nom <=3 ) b on a.item_id=b.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity i on b.supplier_id=i.company_id INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user u on i.user_id=u.user_id inner join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on i.user_id=w.userid INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c ON a.company_id = c.developer_id left join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register r on b.supplier_id=r.supplier_id and a.item_id=r.item_id where r.item_id is null and c.company_name not like 'test_%'

SELECT DISTINCT b.item_id as itemId,d.category_name,CONCAT(d.category_name,'招募公告') as title ,ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name) as company_name, c.developer_type AS developerType,date_format(b.create_time,'%Y-%c-%e') as created_time, date_format(b.register_end_date,'%Y-%c-%e') as register_end_date, GROUP_CONCAT(area_name.item_name SEPARATOR '、') as area_name, if(b.case_num>0,concat('注资',b.register_fund,'万元及以上，案例',b.case_num,'个以上'),concat('注资',b.register_fund,'万元及以上')) as register_condition FROM ( select item_id,categories,company_id,create_time,register_condition,register_end_date,service_areas, ifnull(register_fund,0) as register_fund ,ifnull(case_num,0) as case_num FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where item_id=@item_id ) b left join ( select item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where supplier_id = @supplier_id and item_id=@item_id ) r on b.item_id=r.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c ON b.company_id = c.developer_id left JOIN ( SELECT company_id,supplier_id FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier a WHERE a.status = 3 AND a.is_del = 0 and supplier_id=@supplier_id ) black on c.developer_id=black.company_id INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on b.categories=d.category_code INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_area area on b.item_id=area.item_id inner join ( select item_code,item_name from b2b_parameter.bizp_area union ALL select 'china','全国' ) area_name on (area.province_code=area_name.item_code or area.city_code=area_name.item_code) WHERE r.item_id is null and black.company_id is null and b.register_end_date>now() AND c.company_name not like 'test_%' GROUP BY b.item_id
